item.check_comment: 检测gcc是否存在
检测gdb是否存在
check if pump have been installed
check if apmd have been installed
check if lsapnptools have been installed
check if redhat-logos have been installed
check if mt-st have been installed
check if kernel-pcmcia-cs have been installed
check if Setserial have been installed
check if redhat-relese have been installed
check if eject have been installed
check if linuxconf have been installed
check if kudzu have been installed
check if gd have been installed
check if bc have been installed
check if getty_ps have been installed
check if raidtools have been installed
check if pciutils have been installed
check if mailcap have been installed
check if setconsole have been installed
check if gnupg have been installed
check if nc have been installed
检测是否设置口令长度限制
检测是否设置口令复杂度限制
检测是否设置口令有效期限制
check if limit only wheel can su
check if limit only wheel can su

item.check_comment: check if limit only wheel can su
check if service echo have been setup
check if service systat have been setup
check if service netstat have been setup
check if service bootp have been setup
check if service tftp have been setup
check if service link have been setup
check if service supdup have been setup
check if service sunrpc have been setup
check if service news have been setup
check if service snmp have been setup
check if service xdmcp have been setup
check if service exec have been setup
check if service login have been setup
check if service shell have been setup
check if service printer have been setup
check if service biff have been setup
check if service who have been setup
check if service syslog have been setup

item.check_comment: check /etc/host.conf
check if /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/all/accept_source_route source route have been closed or not
check if /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/default/accept_source_route source route have been closed or not
check if /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/ens33/accept_source_route source route have been closed or not
check if /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/lo/accept_source_route source route have been closed or not
检测SYN Cookie是否开启
check if Control-Alt-Delete have been enabled
检测suid文件
